targets.query: SELECT mean("head") - mean("cl1")  FROM "changelog" WHERE ("fs" =~ /^$Filesystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "mdt" fill(null)
SELECT (mean("filestotal") - mean("filesfree" ))/ mean("filestotal")  FROM "usage" WHERE ("fs" =~ /^$Filesystem$/) AND ("mdt" =~ /^MDT/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("kbytestotal") - mean("kbytesfree" ))/ mean("kbytestotal")  FROM "usage" WHERE ("fs" =~ /^$Filesystem$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("filestotal")-mean("filesfree")) FROM "usage" WHERE ("fs" =~ /^$Filesystem$/) AND ("mdt" =~ /^MDT/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(mean(*)) FROM "metadata" WHERE ("fs" =~ /^$Filesystem/ AND "mdt" = 'MDT0000') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
